meanings.definition: A device used to measure the absorption or emission of light by a sample at a microscopic level.
meanings.sent1: The scientist used the microspectrophotometer to analyze the tiny particles.
meanings.sent2: The lab technician calibrated the microspectrophotometer before conducting the experiment.
meanings.sent3: When the microspectrophotometer broke down, it shed light on the importance of regular maintenance.
meanings.sent4: The microspectrophotometer acted like a tiny detective, revealing the secrets of the microscopic world.
meanings.sent5: The microspectrophotometer hummed softly as it revealed the hidden colors of the microscopic sample.
